<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs=""
>
[Incredible Reanimated Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=3649) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #180: The Smoking Gun](/Sources.aspx?ID=125) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Clockwork Reanimator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=184)

**Prerequisites**
[Advanced Reanimated Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=3646)

</column>

---

You imbue the necrotized flesh of your reanimated construct companion with strange chemicals and fine-tune the clockwork within, enhancing all its capabilities. It becomes an [incredible construct companion](/Rules.aspx?ID=1613).

<title level="2">Incredible Reanimated Companion leads to...</title>
[Paragon Reanimated Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=3652)
name: Incredible Reanimated Companion
